description:
Section 73 application (minor material amendment) to vary condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission ref P122113 dated 10 June 2013 for the: ‘Conversion of undercroft garages beneath 1-52 Trefil Walk into 17 no 2 bedroom flats and 1 no 3 bedroom flat, as well as the refurbishment and reconfiguration of an existing community centre.’.  The minor material amendments are:
A] Changes to layout of Unit 1
B] Improvements to accessibility routes
C] changes to Williamson Street Entrance
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

AP(0)010.P1; AP(0)100.P2; AP(0)101.P2; AP(0)111.P1; AP(0)112.P1; AP(0)113.P1; AP(0)114.P1; AP(0)120.P1; AP(0)121.P1; AP(0)122.P1; AP(0)131.P1; AP(0)132.P1; AP(0)143.P1; AP(0)200.P5; 091 P1; AP(0)202.P4; AP(0)210.P5;  A092 P1;  AP(0)212.P4; AP(0)220.P4; AP(0)221.P4; 093 P1; 094 P1; AP(0)232.P3; AP(0)241.P4; AP(0)242.P3; AP(0)243.P3; AP(0)244.P1; AP(0)245.P1 and 914 01.

Energy Strategy Report dated 29th August 2012
Ground Engineering – Phase 1 Desk Study Report
Parkhurst Road – Internal Daylight Assessment dated 14th September 2012
BREEAM EcoHomes 2006 Ecology Report
Preliminary Ecological Appraisal dated August 2012
Structural Report for Planning dated 10th September 2012
EcoHomes 2006 Pre-Assessment Report dated 29th August 2012
Noise Assessment Report dated 7th August 2012
Air Quality Assessment  dated 7th August 2012
Design & Access Statement BFF/1087 dated 5th September 2012

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
